trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether a debugger is attached to the process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if a debugger is attached; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Signals a breakpoint to an attached debugger.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Launches and attaches a debugger to the process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the startup is successful or if the debugger is already attached; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
